text.content: Earth boy dream of angel  Angel she be sweet and make him have happy heart  In land of love  Angel dream of earth boy, earth boy who'll be true  And love her till sun grow cold in land of love  Angel walk on street  Earth boy walking too  All at once they meet  Oo-oo-oo dreams come true  Now best part of story  Like two doves in land of love we will always be  Happy angel is you  Happy earth boy is me  Angel walk on street  Earth boy walking too  All at once they meet  Oo-oo-oo dreams come true  Now best part of story  Like two doves in land of love we will always be  Happy angel is you  Happy earth boy is me  Earth boy dream of angel  Angel dream of earth boy  Earth boy dream of angel  Angel dream of earth boy  Earth boy dream of angel
